Testimonials

Take a look at what my mentors and co-workers say...

After joining the team, he quickly got himself familiarized with the code of an internal Android application. During that short span of time, he was able to show his curiosity to learn and implement new things. The project involved the core knowledge of machine learning and I was impressed with his knowledge of the subject. While discussing the project he was very clear and made it a point to understand the pros and cons of every possible solution. During our reviews with the team, he intently listened to the suggestions from other team members and did not hesitate in accepting a few of his shortcomings. He is an honest and keen learner, with a focus on delivering the best possible results.

  • Shashanker Das, Lead Engineer, Samsung R&D
